posts.post_content:
I had a wild hair the other day and rather than migrating to vintage, I thought I'd try my hand at another 520 but all in PSA 2's.  I just started so I need just about everything (I'm at 19 right now).  

Would prefer to buy bulk if anyone has a bunch of them.  PM with what you have and pricing if you can help.

Thanks!!

up to 50 now so thank you for your assistance!  Still looking for bulk PSA 2 commons or if you have some HoF players or SL'ers, that's good as well.

PM with what you have.

Thanks!!

Back at it with the 2s. Feel free to on if you have any you’re looking to sell. 

Thanks!!

bump.  Thanks to a few of you who have reached out!  Glad we were able to work it out!!!  

Still need quite a few!  HoF, SL, commons are all ok.  PM or email [url]tbrambo@yahoo.com[/url] with what you have.

Thanks!
about 1/3 through the 520 now for this project but still looking for a bunch of 2s!  PM or email at [url]tbrambo@yahoo.com[/url] if you're looking to sell!
Still looking for 2's.  If you have any you're wanting to sell, let me know!  [url]tbrambo@yahoo.com[/url]

up to about 200 in the set now but still a long way to go as I build the 520.  If you're considering selling your PSA 2's, email at [url]tbrambo@yahoo.com[/url] or PM here.

Thanks!

hey troy, i may have a few available - just psa, not sgc right?  if you have some available would prefer to trade.  send me a pm if so.

thx, jim

just hit the 260 mark in the monster for the all PSA 2 set.  If you have any, do let me know if you're looking to sell.  Doesn't matter if they're common players, SL'ers or HOF players.  Happy to discuss any and all to see if I can add to this project.

Thanks!

[url]tbrambo@yahoo.com[/url]

Nearly 300 now. Let me know what you have available. 

[url]Tbrambo@yahoo.com[/url].

Down to the last 150. Pm if you have one or many you’re looking to sell.

Here's a list of needs (Hopefully it's not too small to read!)
Cool Project Troy, Good Luck on the remaining
